example.sen: I've been bathing their apple crisp and Tater Tots,in the Beam of Sloth.

example.sen: This place will be burnt to a crisp,before anyone even arrives.
example.sen_tran: 在他们到来之前,这个地方就会燃为灰烬

example.sen: You're saying dad's up there burnt to a crisp?
example.sen_tran: 你是说我爸在里头烧的一干二净了吗

example.origin: 来自《太空堡垒卡拉狄加 第4季 第18集》
example.sen: Dead as in "crash landed, burnt to a crisp" dead.

example.origin: 来自《大西洋帝国 第1季 第12集》
example.sen: It's like walking through a wood on a crisp autumn--,...from the snares of the devil,
